name: Astro-guy
description:
This is my Astro-guy project.

Modifications :

1. Level one is a whole new level.

2. By changing the scripts for level one the win condition changed (collecting 2 blue pickups).

3. Using both small and medium platforms with new sets of waypoints in level 1.

4. .exe file with an attractive icon.

Created By Nicki Najafi.
